title: 5.0.0rc1 mar 4 build: deleted files doesn't list any of the deleted files or folders
body:
i tried deleted files on windows, and while the files and folders delete, the deleted files or folders app don't show in the deleted files tab

i log into owncloud
i upload a few files in the web interface
i delete a couple files
i click on deleted files
there is nothing in the deleted files tab

running on
sql server 2008 r2
windows 2008 r2, iis

logs:
warning php undefined index: dirlisting at c:\inetpub\wwwroot\owncloud\apps\files_trashbin\templates\index.php#8 march 4, 2013 16:06
